title: Card, "Karrie Jacobs: Change of Address", 1992
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
Recto: Four lines of typewritten double-spaced capital letters, centered top-to-bottom and imprinted all across the card, inform the recipient of Karrie Jacobs's having moved her home and office. The new location information in the right half is enclosed within an incised rectangle that can be removed and used on a Rolodex.

Verso: Five one-sentence paragraphs, in upper and lower case typewritten letters, referring to Karrie Jacobs's move and to M&Co's role in producing the change of address card, are imprinted on the left. M&Co, in miniature bold type, is imprinted along the left edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Card, "Karrie Jacobs: Change of Address", 1992.
1992. Offset lithorgraphy. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-299.
